refnamediv.refpurpose: check if current session connection variables have been altered

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para:
This function is used to determine if the session variables have changed between a call to connection_vars_set
and current point of execution. A call to connection_vars_set
will cause subsequent calls to connection_is_dirty
to return true.
The function is useful in postprocessing functions for making conditional storage of session variables in a database table.

refsect1.title: Return Values
refsect1.para:
An INTEGER
indicating true (1) or false (0).

example.title: Checking Connection Variables
example.programlisting:
<?vsp
    declare rc integer;
    connection_vars_set ();
    rc := connection_is_dirty (); -- rc is equal to 0
    connection_set ('ID', 14);
    rc := connection_is_dirty (); -- rc is equal to 1
  ?>
